name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Background for Google™ Homepage and Google+

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Select a background image for your Google™ Homepage and Google+.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
BETA VERSION 1.0.5

Please be aware that there might be some bugs running around. Will try to make it better but for now you can use it as is :) No animal will be harmed if you do.

Fixes:
- v1.0.2
-- -- added the icon opening options in new tab
- v1.0.1 
-- white username / mail turned back to black without the shadow

Known bugs:
- sometime background will not fit the window (you must resize it even just a bit)
- there is still grey background in profile

Change and unify the look of your Google Search website and Google+. Get rid of the ugly light grey background and choose the picture you love and.. check out the slick sidebar.

Based on extension of / Wykonano na bazie dodatku autorstwa: Albert Choi
Background Image for Google™ Homepage
